spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout is only partially consistent with the 2D plan. The living/dining is generally central, but multiple walls/room boundaries around the right-side bedroom cluster (Bed-1/Bed-4/C.Toi/Toi-1/utility) are rearranged. The two distinct decks in the plan (long main deck + smaller deck at Bed-1) are not clearly reproduced as two separate, correctly shaped exterior spaces. Several interior openings/doors do not match the plan’s positions and swing/orientation, and window placement is substantially simplified compared to the plan. Room proportions (notably living/dining and kitchen/utility widths) appear distorted.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is visually consistent, but adjacency fidelity is weak in the right half: the bathroom cluster and bedroom connections do not cleanly match the plan’s arrangement. Some rooms/bathrooms appear merged or re-partitioned compared to the 2D plan. Doors are often represented as open portals without correct embedding/swing representation, reducing fidelity. No clear evidence of an exact foyer/HQ segmentation as shown in plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is plausible but does not closely follow the 2D plan: kitchen is rendered as an island/peninsula arrangement rather than the plan’s galley/L-counter feel; dining set size/layout differs; bedroom furniture placement is generic and not aligned to the plan’s indicated bed/wardrobe locations. Scale is inconsistent (dining table/chair spacing appears oversized relative to circulation).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric-style render with generally good lighting and minimal geometry artifacts. However, the projection is not strictly orthographic/isometric accurate (perspective feel), and some wall intersections/openings read ambiguous, reducing clarity for verification.

detected_errors.description: Right-side bedroom/bath cluster mispartitioned: Bed-1/Bed-4/C.Toi/Toi-1 arrangement does not match the 2D plan’s wall layout and adjacency.
Second distinct deck (the smaller deck attached to Bed-1 in the plan) is not clearly present as a separate, correctly bounded exterior space.
Room proportion distortion: living/dining and kitchen/utility proportions appear inconsistent with the plan (living/dining reads reduced; kitchen reads widened with island).
Door placement deviations: multiple internal door locations do not match the plan (notably around bathrooms and the corridor connections on the right side).
Door orientation/swing not represented to plan; several planned hinged doors are rendered as open apertures, losing correct orientation information.
Window placement simplified/misaligned: plan shows extensive window runs (especially along living/deck edges and bedroom exteriors) but the 3D includes fewer/shorter window openings.
Foyer/HQ segmentation from the plan is not clearly reproduced as distinct spaces with matching boundaries.
Hallucinated kitchen configuration: a prominent island/peninsula layout appears that is not indicated in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated/altered openings: additional or enlarged wall openings between spaces (compared to the plan) create different circulation paths.
